preamble.title: modern-aiken/generics-test
preamble.description: Tests modern Aiken v1.1.x+ naming - demonstrates SundaeSwap V3 fix

cardano/address/Credential.title: Credential
cardano/address/Credential.description: Demonstrates fix: Module path with slashes becomes package cardano.address.model

Option<cardano/address/Credential>.title: Option
Option<cardano/address/Credential>.description: Demonstrates fix: This generic type definition should be SKIPPED (not generate a class)

types~1escapes~1TestType.title: TestType
types~1escapes~1TestType.description: Demonstrates fix: JSON Pointer escapes (~1 = /) work correctly
